body.ab: tshad ma'i spyi don bsdus pa gtsang drug pa rdo rje 'od zer gyis mdzad pa'o ||

phya kha 1 na re rtog pa'i mtshan nyid don spyi 'dzin pa yin no zhes zer ba la de mi 'thad ste | de ltar na dbang
shes lnga nyaMs su myong pa'i rang rig gis myong bya dbang po lnga po de rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin par yongs chod la grub pas spyi 'dzin pa rnam gcad la khegs pa'i phyir | rtog pa'i don mngon sum gyis khegs par thal | 'dod na dbang shes rtog bral du sgrub pa'i rtags thams chad tha snyad sgrub sha rtag du 'gyur ro | des na rtog pa'i tha snyad du mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid ni brjod bya brjod byed 'drer rung 'dzin pa yin no ||

dan kha 1 na re the tshom la gzhan sel med gzhan sel yod na nges par thal rtog pa'ang nges par 'jog pa gzhan sel gyis 'jog pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba de mi rigs te | rtog pa'i gzhan sel
zhes pa de zhen pa'i sa bon bsal ba 1 dgos saM mngon gyur bsal bas kyang chog | dang po ltar na yid spyod la 'ang gzhan sel med par thal zhen pa'i sa bon sel mi nus pa'i phyir ro | 2 pa ltar na sgra rtag gaM mi rtag gam zhes ma nges par zhen tsam na nges par zhen pa mngon gyur yod daM med | dang po ltar na rtog 2 dus 1 car 'jug par thal | 2 pa ltar
na gzhan sel med pa nyams so des na the tsom la 'ang gzhan sel yod pa yin no ||

dang po gzhan dag rgya na re myong ba dang rtags la ma brten
par don mtha' 1 tu nges pa zhes zer te | 'di rigs pa ma yin de ltar na sgra rtag par zhen pa'i rang log shes kyi rang ldog 'di 'ang yid spyod du 'gyur | 'dod na yul bden pa dang ldan par thal lo | des na yid spyod kyi tha snyad du mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid ni myong ba dang rtags la ma rten par sngar ma rtogs pa'i don bden pa nges pa'o |

yang gangs | khyung kha 1 na re mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid mtshon bya mtshon pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no zer ba la | de ltar na gtan tshigs kyi
mtshan nyid kyang bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no byas pa la de'i tha snyad daM don ldog yin | dang po ltar na gtan tshigs kyi tha snyad dang rnam grangs par 'gyur 2 pa ltar na phyogs chos khyab pa las ma 'das zhe na | 'dir yang mtshon bya mtshon pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi tha snyad dam don ldog la byed | dang po ltar na mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad dang rnam grangs par 'gyur 2 pa ltar
na don ldog chos 3 tshang ba las mang das so ||

gzhan dag stod rgya na re gtan tshigs kyi tha snyad de tshul 3 nges rung du don la gnas pa
la rten pa yin gyi dngos su nges pa mi dgos so zhes zer |

yang dag rigs pa'i gsal byed sgron mao°°° zhes bya bazhes °°° | bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' rab 'byaM la chos kyi snang ba rgyas pa lung rigs kyi dbang phyug | thugs dgongs naM mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa dpal ldan rtsang pa 'bre dang | sde snod 'dzin pa'i mnga' bdag rnaM par dpyod pa'i blo gros 'gran zla dang bral ba | rje btsun 'jaM dbyang dang tha mi dad pa
bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen gnyal pa zhang tshes kyi zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos len pa | rnaM dpyod kyi rtsal gyis phyir rgol log lta'i dpung 'joMs shing || legs bshad rigs°°°gs pa'i thur mas blo gros gyi myig 'byed pa | btul zhugs la legs par gnas pa'i | shag kya'i dge' slong rdo rje 'od zer gyis
sbyar ba || rdzogs s+hyo || dge bar gyur cig ||
